Sentencas: Partial internal electronic short circuit continues to be a main problem for ceria-based oxide-ion conductors.
Titulo: Novel reduction-resistant Ba(Ce,Zr)1-xGdxO3-δ electron-blocking layer for Gd0.1Ce0.9O2-δ electrolyte in IT-SOFCs

Sentencas: A novel composite anode composed of BaZr0.45Ce0.45Gd0.1O3-delta and nickel (Ni-BZCG) is proposed to avoid partial reduction from Ce4+ to Ce3+ in Gd0.1Ce0.9O2-delta (GDC) electrolyte by forming a functional electron-blocking interlayer in situ at Ni-BZCG vertical bar GDC interface.
Titulo: Novel reduction-resistant Ba(Ce,Zr)1-xGdxO3-δ electron-blocking layer for Gd0.1Ce0.9O2-δ electrolyte in IT-SOFCs

Sentencas: Open circuit voltages (OCVs) above 1.0 V at 650 degrees C can be achieved for cells with Ba-containing anodes, which are much higher than the value obtained with Ni-GDC anode (lower than 0.8 V) under the same conditions.
Titulo: Novel reduction-resistant Ba(Ce,Zr)1-xGdxO3-δ electron-blocking layer for Gd0.1Ce0.9O2-δ electrolyte in IT-SOFCs

Sentencas: The enhanced OCVs are attributed to the formation of a new electron-blocking layer with GDC@Ba(Ce,Zr)(1-x)GdxO3-delta core/shell structure.
Titulo: Novel reduction-resistant Ba(Ce,Zr)1-xGdxO3-δ electron-blocking layer for Gd0.1Ce0.9O2-δ electrolyte in IT-SOFCs

Sentencas: The interrelations between the structural interlayer and the OCVs for improved cells are also studied.
Titulo: Novel reduction-resistant Ba(Ce,Zr)1-xGdxO3-δ electron-blocking layer for Gd0.1Ce0.9O2-δ electrolyte in IT-SOFCs

Sentencas: Furthermore, based on the microstructure of the new structured interlayers in the fuel cells, the high polarization resistance can be mainly attributed to the insulative BaNiO3-delta phase reducing reaction zone at anode.
Titulo: Novel reduction-resistant Ba(Ce,Zr)1-xGdxO3-δ electron-blocking layer for Gd0.1Ce0.9O2-δ electrolyte in IT-SOFCs
Novel reduction-resistant Ba(Ce,Zr)1-xGdxO3-δ electron-blocking layer for Gd0.1Ce0.9O2-δ electrolyte in IT-SOFCs
